analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#597-611):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#610-611)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#611)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#399-497):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#412-421)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#425-430)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#468-469)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#465-468)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#399-497):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#412-421)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#425-430)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#469-474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#471-474)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParticipantWhitelist(msg.sender,this,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#492-493)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- time > crowdsale.startsAt() (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#763-764)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#344-388):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#366)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#379-382)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#387-388)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#388)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#387)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#367)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#375)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#399-497):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#412-421)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#425-430)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#458-462)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#457)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#462-465)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#512-531):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#515-519)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#523-524)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#524-526)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#521-523)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#521)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#844-872) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#868-872)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#865-872)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#220-222)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#10-11)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#203-204)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeffe3381cf128b514772d981ce12c1c3a041e69c.sol#204)
